overview:
Bryan Shepard, CEO and Co-Founder of SWEEPiO, The Promotional Gaming Platform for a Mobile Connected World!

Shepard has more than 20 years in leading and managing in the mobile, web and big data spaces. He is the former CEO and Founder of Mango Mobile, and had oversight in Mango’s acquisition by Omnicom Group (NYSE: OMC). Shepard was the Director of Marketing for Samsung Mobile and their top carrier partners, including AT&T, Verizon Wireless, Sprint and T-Mobile. Prior to Samsung Mobile, Shepard was the VP of Marketing at Value America (NASDAQ: VUSA) and was a member of the executive team responsible for raising multiple rounds of venture capital and taking the company public in April 1999.
